content.detailedDescription: While i was drying my hair one night late summer 1977 i was getting ready to go out i looked outside through the window it was night time and i had woods across the street and i saw a long white light headlights back then where a little yellow so it didn't look like car lights from may be on a road past the woods as i kept checking now and then it was getting closer i first thought well it's an airplane didn't give it a second thought would look again and it was getting really close and still very low well i finally walked out of my door down a small hill right to the curb it broke right over head over the trees it was in front of me about two hundred feet or less above me making no sound the lights were now right in front of me and they were light emitting windows not clear windows white light emitting windows with dividers segments and i did not know until this thing was passing over my head going by me that i now saw it was around but it was a mothership maybe for 500 yards around the windows went clear around it it was moving approximately 10 miles an hour my jaw dropped my tongue was hanging out and i actually ran down the hill and down the street following it the street ended in a dead end so i had to stop and this craft headed towards new york city. we checked with the local airports they had no reported sightings then was done talking to a friend of mine on the phone he did not believe me and i started going down the street walking i was heading towards a watering hole, a bar i only got thirty feet down the street and a policeman was patrolling driving by and he stopped i knew all the police in edgemont new york he asked me if i needed a ride i jumped in the car his name was officer rasmussen as soon as i got in the car i said you're not going to believe what i just saw he said don't tell me it was another flying saucer i don't want to make out another report! the next day the local scarsdale inquirer had an article that their police department in scarsdale their phone was ringing off the wall and there was a large good size article in the reporter dispatch of paper i believe that a white plains that described an incident that this was simply a cessna with a broken display sign which of course was not the case at all. 7 years later i went to a ufo convention in brewster new york and told my story. other than that there was nothing in the news i was shocked. there is no question it was a ufo we have nothing in this world that could make a craft like that it was truly a mother ship; the windows as i call them were about maybe 15 feet wide by 20 feet high and they went all around the ship possibly 3 yankee stadium size in 1. unfortunately i was alone when i saw it when i came back inside i told my father who was a pilot private pilot and he called all the powers of the local and reports and they reported nothing i was in shock.
content.summary: Was in my house drying my hair looked out the window and saw a long white light looked like it was in the woods i waited for it for a pretty long time and it finally broke over the trees and i ran outside and saw it. moved very slowly, no sound.O it

content.detailedDescription: Just observing the beautiful clear nght sky at home.I 1st noticed the object was headed toward a plane and it's unusual lights caught my attention. then once the object got closer it rose straight up to avoid plane and then hovered still for a min or 2 and then proceed to excelerate at a rapid speed passing other aircrafts going the same direction like they were stationary but were not. the photo i'm sending is 1 of many and to view it must be expanded. or enlarged to see the craft
content.summary: Observed object w/unique lghts approaching airplane then object rose rapidly straight up to avoid plane and then traveled se and out of site in seconds passing other aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Driving home after visiting hospitalized father. alone approx 11 pmhighway ran alongside ohio river i looked to my left and saw 2 objects flying alongside my car. they were very low over the water about 20 to 30 ft. i couldn't determine exact shape   appeared rectangular with red light on front heard no noise. instantly they turned at approx 125 degree angle and disappeared over the horizon (a distance of 20 miles in a matter of 2 seconds i din't know how long they had been alongside me but when i turned and saw them they turned and were gone in an instant. i have never reported this to authorities but did tell family members
content.summary: 0bjects flew alongside car

content.detailedDescription: While camping at ocotillo wells vehicular recreation area, my wife, daughter, and i witnessed two horizontal rows of bright reddish-orange lights appear to the north, about 30 degrees above the horizon. we watched these lights for over an hour. during this time, the lights on the right would slowly fade completely out and then suddenly reappear on the left. sometimes all of the lights would fade out and then reappear a few minutes later in a different spot to north. after over an hour, all of the lights disappeared. a few minutes later, a single, much larger and much brighter orange light appeared. this light hovered for at least 3 minutes,then descended very slowly. just as the light looked like it was going to touch down, it faded completely out. during our sighting, none of the lights moved left or right at all. in the video i have attached, you can see the single orange light, although it is hard to make out. it is above and to the left of the headlights. it looks like it was blinking, but there was no blinking when i saw it. sorry for the bad quality, but i tried to zoom in, but of course my phone wouldn't focus.
content.summary: 8 reddish lights, 2 horizontal rows of 4. faded out on right, reappeared on left slowly. then all gone and followed by 1 bright and much bigger red light that descended slowly.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a star like object zig zagging in the sky directly straight up , i called my 2 friends over. as i pointed to the object, it began to ascend into deep space as if it knew i or we was watching it. then a beam of light came out of the sky in semi slow motion when all 3 of us turned our heads to the right. the light had a sound or hum to it. then the event was over.  we were at a location in the wind river national forest. we was at a campsite called photographers point ar 11,000 feet near pinedale wyoming. i have also had 3 different sightings. go figure
content.summary: Star like

content.detailedDescription: It was around 11pm and i was on my computer. i was on facebook and began noticing a facebook group for our town area giving a lot of notifications suddenly. i checked the page and noticed about five different posts of strange lights in the saint cloud area where i lived over a golf course. i watched the videos and kept seeing people commenting seeing they saw them as well. i told my mother and we headed outside to see if i could see them as well. i looked south east toward the direction of the golf course and sure enough, we saw 3/4 lights stationary and glowing. the objects stayed in place for 30 minutes before they began to move south and others on the facebook page in other cities began reporting seeing them. they made no noise and were white, red, and orange in color. they were orb shaped. i have never seen anything like them. i was fascinated and terrified all at once that hundreds were seeing them. eventually i lost sight of them but they continued according to other reports.
content.summary: Strange lights observed by hundreds in town

content.detailedDescription: Paseaba con unos amigos por el faro de la playa de los alemanes (zahara de los atunes) y solemos hacer fotos con frecuencia. al regresar a casa descargamos las fotos en el ordenador y al comprobar las fotos vimos la anomalía, al principio pensamos que se trataba de una nube, pero al observarla con mas atención, vimos que se trataba de otra cosa.
content.summary: Foto accidental , no lo ví porque la posición del sol no me lo permitía ver,

content.detailedDescription: I was working for a major oil company driving to mississippi to do some work between lafayette louisiana and baton rouge louisiana, it appeared in front of me out of my right side of the windshield.  it was huge. it had bright red and white lights around the edge and was dull gray in the interior.  i observed it for about 20 minutes and it disappeared suddenly.  never told anyone about this until now. this was in the summer of 1972.  never saw it again.
content.summary: Ovasl shaped with gray interior and bright lights around the edege.  (huge)

content.detailedDescription: In 1974 iberia ohio i saw a cigar shap craft 70  feet long. it was so low to the ground i thought it was going to land. it did not make a sound. red green and white lights rotating. it hoverd for mins. i blink the craft is 7 miles away and stoped with no sound. i got my mom from the house. she saw the craft also. that is the truth. found out later my moms preacher saw the same craft that same night.
content.summary: 70  feet long cigar shap hovered for mins red green white lights i blink it was 7 miles     away  and stop

content.detailedDescription: This happened to me about 6:30am before time changed, so it was still very dark outside. i was at my house taking the trash can up to the road. the sky was clear (no clouds).  i was walking back down my driveway looking at the stars and i noticed this object coming from the north. i thought it was a satellite because it was that high in the sky and had no flashing light just like a satellite and was moving about the speed of a satellite. the first thing i noticed that made me pay closer attention to this was that the light seemed to get brighter and then the object made a very sharp turn to the east and seemed to accelerate and accend very rapidly and disappeared.  now where this object disappeared there was 3 stars around it and my vision was never obscured from clouds or anything else so the object just disappeared. i have seen several satellites and i have never seen one change course and then just disappear. i have never been a person that believes in ufo's but what i observed that morning i truely believe was something that was not part of our world,and i also feel very strongly that whatever it was knew that i saw it. this is my story and i would swear that the information i have provided is true and as far as i am concerned this was something that was not man made.
content.summary: Looked like a satellite but changed direction. never seen that before

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing this bright white object for the past several weeks. the first time was on my way back from the hospital where my dad and i were visiting my mom. we were driving down the road and my dad said look at that, i said what and he said that light and it looks like it has a ladder hanging down from the back part. so when i first got a look at it was on the left side of the car and as we went on down the road it was on the right. it was very bright and i knew it was not a aircraft since it had no nav lights. since i was driving i didn't get a very good look at it, so over the next 5 days we continued to see this light and it never appeared to be moving or it was moving at a very slow speed. so after my mom got out of the hospital i never thought any more about it. i am a smoker and i don't smoke in my house so on november 29, 2016 right around 7:15 or so i went out on my front porch to smoke and i look out and i see this bright white light object again. i mean this thing was just super bright , so i go back in the house and get my binoculars and look at it and it is very bright white and i know this is not a aircraft and it has like some kind of vapors that show around it, and am i am watching this i see like the center of it open and separate from the bottom for a few seconds and then close back up. i didn't see anything go in or come out of it when it did that. what ever it was moved at a very slow speed and seemed to follow a west heading. i did go back into the house and got my cell phone and took pictures of it and a short video, and the video was a bit shaky so isn't moving it is just my hand. there were also other people who saw this and they were from the recovery home where mom is, the driver of there vehicle were out looking at christmas lights and they noticed it and observed it for a while also. i lost sight of it when the view became blocked by buildings. i know what i saw was a ufo, there are no planes, helicopters or craft that look like that due to how bright it was and there were no navigation lights on it and it had also changed shape from almost round to a saucer shape as you can see in the photos. i had a few more pictures and a short video but no space to attach them
content.summary: Very bright white , dim and get brighter, very slow moving

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing this bright white object for the past several weeks. the first time was on my way back from the hospital where my dad and i were visiting my mom. we were driving down the road and my dad said look at that, i said what and he said that light and it looks like it has a ladder hanging down from the back part. so when i first got a look at it was on the left side of the car and as we went on down the road it was on the right. it was very bright and i knew it was not a aircraft since it had no nav lights. since i was driving i didn't get a very planes, helicopters or craft that look like that due to how bright it was and there were no navigation lights on it and it had also changed shape from almost round to a saucer shape as you can see in the photos. i had a few more pictures and a short video but no space to attach them
content.summary: Very bright white , dim and get brighter, very slow moving

content.detailedDescription: I was on martha's vinyard fishing with a friend of mine while the clinton's were vacationing. we had been shark fishing from shore with great success until it suddenly stopped. i noticed what i thought was a very large sailboat, but quickly realised that it was a boat. there were lights on the water line that i initially thought was the deck and mast lights of a sailboat. the lights started to bounce around what i had thought was the deck, but then they shot up into the air. it got incredibly bright and lit up the sky and the beach. it the sated to move slowly towards shore towards us. it after a few minutes shot out a whit artificial light into a beam focused onto the beach like it was scanning around. my friend and i were initially not scared and we're very interested until it kept coming closer and the beam of light was on our feet. my friend jumped in the car and was scared, then he jumped out again and we kept asking each other if we were both seeing this actually happening. as the ufo got close you could see it was a triangle shape with three lights underneath the ufo. the sound it made was the weirdest thing of all because i have never heard that sound ever again. the ship finally was right above us and we could see very clearly the three light and the triangle shape of the ufo. once it got directly over us it seemed to disappear, but not because it shot off. it just disappeared. my friend and i were very shaken up and jumped into the truck and tried to talk about what we just saw. the weird thing was that we both fell asleep in less than five minutes. when we fell asleep it was somewhere close to 1:30am. i woke up at 4am by the sound of the ufo very close to us. i looked out of the window and woke up my friend to show him the ufo was back again. the ufo was maybe 150 yards down the beach from us and was 50 feet or less from the ground going back out to the water where the lights we thought was a sailboat was still out there, but just kind of appeared. my friend and i didn't talk about the experience again for over ten years, but when we did talk about it we remember everything the same.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I saw what looked like a boat on the horizon while president clinton was vacationing in martha's vinyard. the experience lasted for a while, then left. i fell asleep talking with my friend, then in came back closer.

content.detailedDescription: Was traveling in cab to office when cab mate spotted a blue light in the sky.We all were able to see the blue light untill 20 to 25 mins untill it started raining.It was in shape of a typical ufo.Tried to take pictures.Was not clear but able to get a picture.
content.summary: Blue light in the sky seen for 20 mins

content.detailedDescription: Large disc began to get closer when noticed , occupant appeared was visible barely but had defined shadow
content.summary: Large silver disc curved rear edges , occupant barely visible but left shadows

content.detailedDescription: I went out side for a cigarette and was looking in the sky like i do every night and saw weird light thought it was a air plane but it just hovered there then i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me so i went in the house and got my phone and recoded it thought is was weird and peeked my curiosity just wondering what it could be i do not think it was alien then it was just gone
content.summary: Saw a strange light thought it was air plane but it just hovered there for 20 min then i thought it was my eyes playing tricks so i grabbed my phone and recorded it to see i have no idea what it is

content.detailedDescription: I was about 12 or 13 years old and was headed to visit my sister in another area of the city. it was around 7 pm and i was standing at the bus stop and it was getting dark when a bright light made me look up. what i saw was a real bright object flying across the sky and illuminating everything around. i followed the path of the object thinking it would crash against the mountains ahead but it went past over the sierra and i lost sight of it. a couple of guys standing at the bus stop were as astonished as i was and we asked each other if we had seen that. one of them said we would for sure hear about it the day after on the local media. then i went back home and forgot about seeing my sister. the day after i checked the news and there was only a brief mention of the sighting on tv.
content.summary: Observed this brigh flying object across the monterrey sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to get my mail on day late one fall day. i looked up at the sky to observer the clouds. i saw 4 lights spinning clockwise, and one off to the right and one in front of the 4 spinning lights. on a timed cycle one in front would go into the circle and one swapped places with the one on the right, and the one on the right would go in front of the 4 lights. 
this cycle of lights swaping places kept repeating on like a timer. it took maybe 3 minutes then switch places over and over. i watched for 10-15 minutes till my neck hurt, and went back into my house. i do not know what i saw, being ex airforce i do not know what it was. i worked on the flightline so i knew what was up in the sky if it was a plane or not. this was not planes. just spheres rotating and changing places periodically.
content.summary: 4 lts. hovered clockwise, 1 off right and one in frt of the 4. then frt moved into 4 and one move right and right one moved in frt. few min. and does swap again

content.detailedDescription: On tendal air force base i john curran a pfc and my friend philip fazio pfc were sitting near an hut on the air mans beach having a beer while two air police were questioning why we were there, we saw the ufo zig zaging across the horizon coming towards us. the air police radio called and said there was an alert that scrambled two delta f102 jets to intercept an reported sighting. the object flew toward us within 30 feet and 20 feet off the ground. all four of us remarked on the sighting. it hovered there for 3 minutes pulsating as the f102 came across the sky towards our location the craft then zig zaged at extreme speed back across the horizon as the jets slowly attempted to intercept the ufo, radio chatter confirmed the two pilots sighted it as well and was seen on radar. once the event had ended the air police did give fazio and i article 15 tickets and we were on our way. weeks after an air force investigator from washington came to the base and interviewed us and his conclusion was that it was swamp gas. i can not remember the exact date but it was between i think 1965 and 1966 and some time in the fall season.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White pulsating light emitting translucent solid, 5' thick 8x16' widths oval

content.detailedDescription: So when we were coming in from a night enjoying a fire in back yard. as we were putting chairs away. i and my next door neighbors son. we saw big orange/yellow glowing slowly moving toward us very low. it kept coming no noise at all. i was standing on my deck and neighbors are now on their deck. this orange/yellow object came to a stop over our city. as we are watch it gets lower and lower. the neighbors and i almost said at same time. we said it looks like a flying bus. we watched this for 5 to 10 minutes. than this object started going up straight up. than it went faster up and disappeared into the stars we could see it anymore. we were shocked my wife would come outside. yet my neighbor son who was 22 yrs and his mother about same age as me. i will never forget seeing this most amazing thing i have ever seen. now i'm always looking up. wondering if i'm going to see something like this again.3
content.summary: This big orange/yellow glowing object came from se. it came very slow. my neighbor and i were watching this thing. his mother came out on their deck watching this object slow coming toward us. it slowed over west bend, wi. stopped went straight up into st

content.detailedDescription: I was going to sleep in my bedroom on this cloudless, dark night in abq, and i saw a "strip" of four or five lights that were the same brightness zip across the sky, with 'headlights' that were shining on a white, shiny object. the ufo seemed to be chasing that object.
content.summary: Chasing a white object, had 'headlights,' zoomed across sky from my bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1993 or 92.  my wife (then girlfriend) and i commuted back and forth to college on tuesdays.  we were coming back from college home to "tawas city".  930 at night there was a strange light in front of us.  it was a perfect cold crisp night out with no clouds.  you could see the stars.  we were probable about 60 miles from wurtsmith airforce base which was closing at the time and i remember thinking "i thought all the b52 were gone already" my first thought was this thing was crashing because it was so low to the ground and i thought it may land on the road in front of us.  the light was huge.  when we came up over the hill maybe 50 to 100 feet in the air.  the lights flashed and disappeared...I pulled over right away and listened and heard know noise or saw that the stars were not darkened out.  this happened 2 x.  exactly 1 week apart.  i am a very busy person and have always wanted to tell someone about this.  both my wife and i witnessed this.  the 2nd time the lights acted differently and spun and flashed.  i would rather explain more over the phone.  i could be more detailed.   no time have to rush to work.
content.summary: 2 sitings 1 week apart same place same day of the week my wife and me both witness

content.detailedDescription: This happened in the 1990's...It wasnt so unusual to me as ive had a lifetime of experiences..Even contacted bud hopkins people who confirmed my experiences as probable abduction.My family lived on harry mangurians "mockingbird farm" in ocala, fl..My daughter, her friend and i were outside at the farm when we saw football shaped, metallic objects in the sky..I knew right away they were ufo's..Shortly after sighting, black silent helicopters rushed up to the objects and the ufo's immediately accelerated and were gone.The odd thing about it is i remembered the whole incident, my daughter only remembered the helicopters and her friend had total amnesia about the event..I never reported it as ive seen ufo's, pulsing blue lights in my home, missing time and physical evidence on my body..Its no big deal to me any more..Its an interesting experience..Im 66yrs old..I wanted to report this while im still able
content.summary: My daughter,her friend and i saw football shape ufo's,then black helicopters came,ufo's flew off fast

content.detailedDescription:
I drove the car on highway 40 going north to shop in chatham, ontario. the sky was completely cloud-covered. i was admiring the silvery color of the day as i drove along.

10:20 a.M. is not the exact time but it's close within 5 minutes. i can tell by my shopping receipts what approximate time i seen this disk.

about 2 miles away from leon's furniture, i noticed a luminous disk in the sky peeking out of the cloud cover. it was pretty big. it looked like an average night-time moon size that was luminous.

except this was day-time and the disk was luminous and featureless. i have never seen a luminous moon in the day-time. i've seen the moon in the day-time and it has never been luminous. the day-time moon looks kind of faint, white with grey features.

this disk looked very close, much closer than the moon but i couldn't judge distances. it looked too big, too luminous and too close.

so for about 2 minutes, i drove the speed limit of 80 km and watched for this disk to peek out of the clouds. it peeked out a few times.  the road was unusually clear for this time of day. it appeared that the girl in the car behind me was watching this object as well.

then, i stopped at the stop lights right by leon's furniture.

the disk came out of the cloud-cover and it just so happened that the sun came beaming through this same cloud right behind the disk. even as i viewed this beaming light, i was thinking that this sun was too low in the sky to be the sun and it seemed like the bright light was coming from a much closer place than the sun. shouldn't the sun be higher at 10am?

the disk did not turn black like the moon does in an eclipse when it passes in front of the sun. instead, the disk became transparent and the light shined right through it. it was a blindingly bright light. the disk was still visible.

because it was so bright, i had to not look and when the stop light turned green, i squinted to see the road because my eyes had got so blinded momentarily from looking at this disk in the light.

i turned the car right away into michael's store driveway and didn't notice where the disk went or the bright light went, if they left or not.

i didn't get scared. i was actually talking to the sky, thunderbirds, and telling it how pretty it was, how nice the grey looked and i had a feeling that they could hear me this time. sometimes, "they" don't hear you talking to them. i wasn't surprised when the disk showed up. it was an enjoyable experience.

that area on highway 40 where i started to see the little disk is a weird area. i seen endless rainbows about 15 years ago in a row and then a few months ago, i seen a lone cloud being sparky and making lightning all by itself on a sunny day in the same general area.
content.summary: Stationionary bright disk in cloud cover, then sun-like light behind it is revealed.

content.detailedDescription: This week i have seen two falling fireballs. first my bf and i thought it was a falling star. but then seeing this second one a few days later, i know it was something strange. the fireball fell straight down rather than streak across the sky. the size was maybe 2 or 3 times a regular star. it fell in about 1.5 to 2 seconds. the first was seen driving west on i 285 and second outside my neighborhood from the same direction in the sky.
content.summary: This week i have seen two falling fireballs. first my bf and i thought it was a falling star. but then seeing this second one a few days later, i know it was something strange. the fireball fell straight down rather than streak across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on hwy 52 toward orlinda & i-65 interstate on ramp.  noticed extra brilliant white light - twinkling pulsating nature with different colors amongst brilliant white - larger light and shine than commercial aircraft landing lights. (different color and radiance as well)  pulled on i-65 south ramp to view to our west, a second large brilliant light - exactly like the the stationary one appeared from "nowhere" to the left (south or west) of this light. was an amazing sight!  clear skies, no sign of other lights or of this light approaching, it just appeared.  it stayed stationary for a few second after it's abrupt introduction and then this second light, moved towards the north around the first object that was still hovering stationary.  it seemed to circle the first light north to west to south and dimmed.  possible blinking lights now visible on this second light as it dimmed and looked more like regular aircraft as it headed southwest and far away at a good speed.  possible testing/training from ft. campbell in clarksville? helicopters?  had windows rolled down during event and heard no sound of helicopters/jet at the time. the first light was still hovering as we left.  this was not venus. had to leave as we were headed to airport.  paid close attention to aircraft and landing lights at bna & nothing compared to these lights.    on returning to the area, headed towards orlinda to see if there was something we may have been confused by, the lights were gone.
content.summary: 2 brilliant lights, one stationary, second abruptly appearing and then flew around other object and away

content.detailedDescription: Daughter was renting her house and went to pick up rent money. daughter, wife and granddaughter were inside keep. all of a sudden a blue light perfectly round beamed around her house. light covered or surrounded her house, light turned off, then turned on again. light lasted a few seconds. orb shot straight up, it was clouded, then clouds opened up, orb went thru it and clouds closed again. maybe a year earlier, est. daughter and grandson saw an orange orb hovering across street for a few minutes and then took off at a high rate of speed
content.summary: Daughterand others saw orb above house and it beamed a light above house twice. the clouds parted as it went straight up then clouds closed

content.detailedDescription:
Took my dog out to go to the bathroom and when he was done i noticed it as a faint light.  it never made a sound but it started moving - kind of floating like a balloon in the soft breeze... the it got very bright and i honestly thought it was going to fly right to me... it dimmed slightly then it seemed to go almost straight up.  as it flew over me i could see three distinct equidistant lights that perfectly formed the shape of a triangle.  it never made a sound and i have 3:49 of video on my iphone 

i was i. the usaf for 3 years and i'm a pretty decent judge of aircraft. i was stationed at sac headquarters in omoha during my tod.  i was on the flight deck daily so i know a plane when i see one.  if this was a plane it's one i've never seen before.  it was so bizarre that it actually freaked me out a bit
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright light that floated towards me changed direction no sound flew overhead triangle clearly

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the porch to have a cigarette. i have great views from there and was looking at the silhouette of the mountains and clouds. sunset was probably 40 minutes earlier and the new moon was nearing the horizon to set over the mountains to the west. 
i leaned against the rail, looking south-east. i came from behind the eaves of the porch. a solid white light, bigger than a star, slightly bigger than venus on a good night.  first i thought it was a meteor, and it might well have been. 
what got my attention though is there was no tail, no change in brightness, no breaking-up or flaring-out. 
and it visibly slowed down twice. then it went behind a low cloud and was gone. it appeared to be going about the speed of a meteor/shooting star. but again, slowed down noticeably twice. 
i was a watch-stander in the merchant marine for 5 years. i've seen a lot of meteor showers from many oceans, aircraft of all sorts, and it was my job to be an observer. my eyesight is better than most. i've never seen a meteor quite like this.
content.summary: Could have been a meteor, but never changed brightness and slowed down twice

content.detailedDescription: This event/sighting took place 25 years ago when i was 12 years old, but it was profound enough that i still remember it like it happened today. my friend and i were playing in his back yard in the afternoon at approximately 2:00-3:00 pm. it was a sunny day with no clouds. his house/yard was in a small neighborhood on the north side of richmond. his house sat adjacent to a large open grassy field with no trees. across from that field was a large single story factory building. while we were playing in the back yard, i remember looking up suddenly across the field and spotting something moving slowly through the air that clearly wasn't normal. the object never changed speed or trajectory. it just traveled at a slow and steady speed until it was out of our sight. i would estimate the object was traveling at only 10-15 mph. we could see this object very clearly because it was only 100-150 yards from us and flying right above the tree tops. this object was disc shaped with the size and thickness of a medium sized car. it was all black with no shine what so ever, like it was painted with a flat black paint like what you see on a stealth fighter jet or bomber. there were no visible lights, windows, doors, antennas, or any other appendages on the object. i could however see some detailed seams on the body of the object. there also was no sound or emissions coming from the object as it traveled past us and out of view. it was as if it were floating on the air. my friend and i just stood there watching in amazement as it traveled past us. we were both speechless. this clearly was not any balloon, air plane, or any other object that i have ever seen to this day.  it was definitely an "unidentifiable object". to my knowledge there were not any other reported sightings of the object that particular day. my friend and i were the only witnesses.
content.summary: Black disc/saucer shaped ufo sighting
